titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: DIVISION OF QUESTION - Mr. Frost demanded that the question of agreeing to the resolution be divided in order to have a separate vote on the election of the Chaplain. The question was divided.
On agreeing to the portion of the resolution electing the Chaplain Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/6/1999--Introduced. Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Jeffrey J. Trandahl as Clerk;(2) Wilson S. Livingood as Sergeant at Arms; (3) James M. Eagen III as Chief Administrative Officer; and (4) Reverend James David Ford as Chaplain.
